description:
Shola has put her blowtorch to deadly use! Repurposing old Armoured Giant and assorted metal pieces into a scrappy suit of armour, she truly has an iron heart!

Armour Plated Shola Outfit
Classic Sports Headgear Bundle
Grease Gun SMG Bundle
Armoured Giant Weapon Skins
Sports Charm Pack
name: Zombie Army 4: Armour Plated Shola Bundle
